|----|----|----|
| A1 | B1 | C1 |

|           |    |    |
|-----------|----|----|
| wide cell |    | B1 |
| A2        | B2 | C2 |

|           |    |    |
|-----------|----|----|
| tall cell | B1 | C1 |
|           | A2 | B2 |
| A3        | B3 | C3 |

|          |    |    |
|----------|----|----|
| big cell |    | B1 |
|          |    | A2 |
| A3       | B3 | C3 |
